thread.section_title: Insight Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Insight Loans | insightloans.com
thread.title: Jake Glass
thread.title_full: Insight Loans reviewed by Jake Glass

author: Jake Glass
title: Jake Glass
text: I am one of those people that has 800 questions and concerns. I know nothing about this process so that makes it worse. Paul Hofman was polite and responsive. He would take time out of his day to figure out the best option for me and my family. We looked at a couple different options and we picked the best for us. At the end it almost fell through and Paul was on my side, not just trying to get my business. In the end we went ahead and are incredibly pleased. He even called me when his wife was at the hospital. He is a wonderful guy and that's why we went with insight loans.
